text: NGC 7838 is a spiral or lenticular galaxy located about 500 million light- years away in the constellation of Pisces. The galaxy was discovered by astronomer Albert Marth on November 29, 1864. NGC 7838 appears to interact with NGC 7837 forming Arp 246. == See also == * List of NGC objects (7001–7840) == References == == External links == * 7838 246 525 Category:Pisces (constellation) Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1864 Category:Spiral galaxies Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Discoveries by Albert Marth
title: NGC 7838
